errorCode.fieldDescription: Error Code for which the error page is created. If no error code is given, code is picked up from node name of the page by default. Error code is used to create error messages i18n keys name. if a custom i18n key is provided in 'error i18n key' properties, no error code needs to be provided
errorCode.name: ./errorCode

errorI18nKeyTitle.fieldDescription: Error Title I18n key . The key is further used to print i18n title on the page. If no i18n key is provided, Error_Title_<ErrorCode> i18n key is used to display title by default.
errorI18nKeyTitle.name: ./errorTitleI18nKey

errorI18nKeyMessage.fieldDescription: Error Message I18n key. The key is further used to print i18n message on the page. If no i18n key is provided, Error_Message_<ErrorCode> i18n key is used to display message by default.
errorI18nKeyMessage.name: ./errorMessageI18nKey
